CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK(Latest_Booking_Date__pc), ISBLANK(Latest_Travel_Date__pc), ISBLANK(FCR_Last_Case_Closed_Date__c) ), NULL, DATE(1900, 01, 01) + MAX( BLANKVALUE(Latest_Booking_Date__pc, DATE(1900, 01, 01)) - DATE(1900, 01, 01), BLANKVALUE(Latest_Travel_Date__pc, DATE(1900, 01, 01)) - DATE(1900, 01, 01), BLANKVALUE(FCR_Last_Case_Closed_Date__c , DATE(1900, 01, 01)) - DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Oldest date value between: Latest Booking date, Last Travel Date and Last Case Closed Date
CustomField.label: Date Used For Deletion
